      • Navigation

        public Navigation(Odometer odometer,
          EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftmotor,

        Parameters:

        leftmotor - Leftmotor instance to control movement

    • Method Detail

      • travelTo

        private void travelTo(int x,
            int y)
        This method make the robot move from its current location as reported by the odometer to the position input as the parameters by first moving vertically(in the y direction) then horizontally(in the x direction).
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate of the destination
        y - Y coordinate of the destination

      • turnTo

        private void turnTo(int theta)
        This method make the robot turn to the heading input as the parameter.
        Parameters:
        theta - Heading (degrees) from 0-360 (north is 0) to which the robot is required to turn.

      • moveForward

        private void moveForward()
        This method makes the robot move forward.

      • moveForward

        private void moveForward(double distance)
        This method makes the robot move forward a specific distance.
        Parameters:
        distance - Distance(cm) the robot is required to move.

      • moveBackward

        private void moveBackward()
        This method makes the robot move backward.

      • moveBackward

        private void moveBackward(double distance)
        This method makes the robot move backward a specific distance.
        Parameters:
        distance - Distance(cm) the robot is required to move.

      • turn

        private void turn(double angle)
        This method makes the robot move a specific angle.
        Parameters:
        angle - Angle(degrees) the robot is required to move. If positive then turns right, if negative then turns left.

      • convertDistance

        private int convertDistance(double distance)
        This method takes as input a distance in cm and converts it into the number of wheel rotations required to cover that distance.
        Parameters:
        distance - Distance is cm.
        Returns:
        Wheel rotations required to travel the distance specified.

      • convertAngle

        private int convertAngle(double angle)
        This method takes as input an angle in degrees and converts it into the number of wheel rotations requires to turn that angle.
        Parameters:
        angle - Angle in degrees the robot is required to turn.
        Returns:
        Number of wheel rotations required to turn the required angle.

      • convertToDegrees

        private double convertToDegrees(double radian)
        This method takes an angle in radians and converts it to degrees.
        Parameters:
        radian - Angle in radians.
        Returns:
        Angle in degrees.
